CustomField.description: Invoice that this line item is paying for - e.g. sponsor payment is adding $100 toward another invoice, then this line item should be $100.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Invoice that this line item is paying for - e.g. sponsor payment is adding $100 toward another invoice, then this line item should be $100.
CustomField.label: Sponsor Payment Invoice
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Noncredit Invoice Line Items (Sponsor Payment Invoice)
